message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. It's an exceptional opportunity tailored to meet your needs and expectations. Given its value to you, we believe it's worth $12,000. However, to facilitate a smoother transaction and considering the current market conditions, I'm offering it to you at a special introductory price of $10,000. This is a limited-time offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement that benefits both of us. Please let me know if this proposal aligns with your budget and preferences.
